```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df<-read_csv("COVID-19_Vaccinations_in_the_United_States_County.csv")
filtered_dataframe<-df %>% 
  filter(Recip_State%in%c("IL","IN","KS","MI","MN","MS","NE","ND","OH","SD","WI")) %>% 
  mutate(Date=as.Date(Date)) %>% 
  filter(Date>="0003-03-20") %>% 
  transmute(Date,Recip_County,Recip_State,Administered_Dose1_Pop_Pct,Completeness_pct,Metro_status)
write_csv(filtered_dataframe,"/Users/matthewvoss/Documents/stat479_groupproject/Stat479_group13/filtered.csv")
```
